info.name: Gallery Module
info.description: API endpoints for gallery management including CRUD operations for gallery images

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Get single gallery entry details by ID (public access)

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Gallery entry retrieved successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": "gallery-uuid-here",
    "title": "Phone Repair Gallery",
    "description": "Before and after photos of phone repairs",
    "image": {
      "id": "image-uuid",
      "url": "https://example.com/gallery-image.jpg",
      "publicId": "gallery-image-id",
      "folder": "app/gallery",
      "altText": "Phone repair gallery image",
      "width": 800,
      "height": 600,
      "format": "jpg",
      "size": 200000
    },
    "category": "Electronics Repair",
    "isActive": true,
    "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
  }
}
